title: Strengthening CS Competencies: Creative Escape Game-Based Design Thinking Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can analyze problem-solving scenarios applying the five stages of design thinking with 80% accuracy.

Learners can achieve 75+ points in formative assessments and apply the design thinking process to real-world cases.

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
